title: 3DS Movie
description:
This is an application that converts 3D videos/movies to be able to be viewed in full 3d on the Nintendo 3DS. After converting the video/movie just move the file in to the file directory in the SD card where other videos are located. It should come up as a new video on the 3DS camera application on the 3DS. Thanks! Please seed!
